#summary The JCatapult Ant cobertura plugin

= Introduction =

This plugin provides applications with the ability to run cobertura code coverage tool when running JUnit tests.

This plugin contains a single XML file that should be imported like this:

{{{
<import file="${ant.home}/plugins-jcatapult/cobertura/1.0/cobertura.xml"/>
}}}

= Targets =

The plugin provides these targets:

== coverage ==

Cleans, instruments, compiles and runs the unit tests. After the unit tests have run this target outputs the code coverage report from Cobertura into the _${dir.target}/test/coverage_ directory.
